birthday.title: Birthday party
objectives_text: Come back to Skara, to finish this quest
birthday.start_text: Our overlord is turning 231 and we want to offer a fabulous variety of food and booze. Can you get us some really interesting stuff to amuse the overlord.
birthday.end_text: Our overlord only ate 3 of our kind. Thank you for your help. Here, this is our famous choco latte. Legend says you should drink it with hot water.

change_me.title: A Real Title
change_me.start_text: Blah blah blah blah bluh blih bleh. /5 more pages of blah/
